About

Simple API endpoint that displays the number of nodes that this one connects to.

Output in JSON

”connections”: {“total”:”123” ,unique:”69”}

Output in XML

<connections> <total>123</total> <unique>69</unique> </connections>

Output in YAML

connections:

  • total: 123
  • unique: 69

PHP version

Tested with PHP 7.0

File Authors

  • Maiyannah Bishop maiyanna.nosp@m.h.bishop@postac.nosp@m.tiv.com

Web

  • postActiv http://www.postactiv.com
  • GNU social https://www.gnu.org/s/social/
